name: Etherym Depth Dweller
text: (Quick Effect) If this card is in your hand, you can banish this card; banish 1 "Etherym" monster you control or in your GY, and if you do, draw 1 card. If this card is Summoned: You can send 1 Sea Serpent monster from your Deck to the GY. You can only use 1 "Etherym Depth Dweller" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
